channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 5 Best Essential Oil Diffusers (and One to Avoid)
item.description: Keep things smelling fresh with these handy home gadgets.

item.title: Chrome for Android now lets you move the address bar to the bottom, too
item.description: Google Chrome’s web browser for Android devices is finally catching up to the notable design change that Safari made with the 2021 introduction of iOS...

item.title: 34 Viral TikTok Gifts That Are Actually Worth a Look (2025)
item.description: We’re testing the gadgets that keep showing up in our feeds. Here's what deserves the hype—and would make awesome presents.

item.title: Wispr Flow raises $30M from Menlo Ventures for its AI-powered dictation app

item.title: The Groove Thing Is a Bluetooth Speaker and Vibrator Combo, Because Why Not?
item.description: Now you can feel your music in an entirely different way, but it might not hit the right notes.

item.title: iPhone customers upset by Apple Wallet ad pushing F1 movie
item.description: However well-received the film may be, iPhone users don't necessarily want their built-in utilities, like their digital wallet, marketing to them.

item.title: ElevenLabs releases a standalone voice generation app

item.title: 5 Best Lip Balms to Try in 2025, All Tested in Tough Conditions
item.description: If your lip balm makes you need more lip balm, try our top picks instead.

item.title: Feds question Ford in hands-free driving investigation

item.title: Anthropic Scores a Landmark AI Copyright Win—but Will Face Trial Over Piracy Claims
